name: string-split
description: Split a string at a specified path by a delimiter into an array of parts

input.description: Any JSON object containing a string value at the specified path

path.description: Dot-separated path to the string field (e.g., 'data.message')

delimiter.description: The delimiter string to split on (e.g., ',', '.', '|')

output.description: Array of string parts split by delimiter, or null if path doesn't exist or value is not a string

examples.description: Split by space in deeply nested string
